title: Air Quality and Meteorology Forecasts for the Next 3-days
text:
Regional meteorological and chemical transport modeling is conducted at 0.25 degree resolution. City-scale meteorological and chemical transport modeling is conducted at 0.01 degree (~1 km) resolution. Domain description and support files are available here .

Indian Cities

Other Cities
